title: Coordinated Wetland management in Italy-Croatia cross border region
abstract: CREW project aims at achieving the following objectives: set up a cross border Observatory to monitor best practices and data on Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands; protect the biodiversity in Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands by the implementation of a coordinated methodology for wetlands management (Wetland Contract); share a cross border strategy and strengthen synergies among Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands; improve the public awareness about the value of the wetlands ecosystems among policy makers, managers, professionals, and general public and strengthen their active engagement in territorial governance.

motivations: There is a need for coordinated management and protection of coastal wetlands in the Italy-Croatia cross-border region to preserve biodiversity.
Lack of public awareness about the value of wetland ecosystems hinders effective governance and conservation efforts.
objectives: Establish a cross-border Observatory to monitor best practices and data on Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Implement a coordinated methodology for wetlands management through the Wetland Contract to protect biodiversity.
Enhance public awareness and engagement in territorial governance among stakeholders.
methods: Set up a cross-border Observatory to monitor and share data on coastal wetlands.
Develop and implement a coordinated methodology for wetlands management.
Share a cross-border strategy and strengthen synergies among Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
results: Improved protection and preservation of biodiversity in Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Enhanced public awareness and engagement in wetland conservation efforts.
Strengthened synergies and coordination among stakeholders in the Italy-Croatia cross-border region.
llama_json.research_subject: Coordinated management and conservation of coastal wetlands in the Italy-Croatia cross-border region

motivations: There is a need for coordinated management and protection of biodiversity in Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
There is a lack of public awareness about the value of wetlands ecosystems and the need for active engagement in territorial governance.
objectives: Establish a cross-border observatory to monitor best practices and data on Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Implement a coordinated methodology for wetlands management to protect biodiversity.
Share a cross-border strategy and strengthen synergies among Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Improve public awareness about the value of the wetlands ecosystems and strengthen their active engagement in territorial governance.
methods: Setting up a cross-border observatory for monitoring best practices and data.
Implementing a coordinated methodology for wetlands management, known as the Wetland Contract.
Sharing a cross-border strategy and strengthening synergies among wetlands.
Improving public awareness and engagement through various initiatives.
results: Improved management and protection of biodiversity in Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Increased public awareness and active engagement in territorial governance.
Strengthened synergies among Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
openai_json.research_subject: Coordinated Wetland Management in Italy-Croatia Cross Border Region

motivations: Coastal wetlands in the Italy-Croatia cross-border region lack coordinated management approaches, threatening biodiversity conservation.
There is insufficient public awareness and engagement regarding the ecological value of wetland ecosystems among stakeholders and the general public.
objectives: Establish a cross-border Observatory to monitor best practices and data on Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands.
Protect biodiversity through implementation of a coordinated wetland management methodology (Wetland Contract) and develop a shared cross-border strategy.
Improve public awareness about wetland ecosystem values and strengthen stakeholder engagement in territorial governance.
methods: Create a cross-border Observatory for monitoring and data collection on coastal wetlands.
Implement a coordinated Wetland Contract methodology for integrated wetland management.
Develop awareness campaigns and engagement activities targeting policy makers, managers, professionals, and the general public.
results: Enhanced protection of biodiversity in Italian and Croatian coastal wetlands through coordinated management.
Strengthened cross-border cooperation and synergies in wetland conservation efforts.
Increased public awareness and active stakeholder participation in wetland governance and protection.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Cross-border coordinated management of coastal wetlands in the Italy-Croatia region
